input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Citizen AW1571 Steel'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports Military Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Prospex Automatic Fieldmaster SBDY101 / SRPG15K'
  - Name='Seiko Prospex 1965 Heritage Diver's Watch SPB451J1'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Titanium Auto'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive One Solar Powered Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Orient Automatic Watch'
  - Name='CASIO G-SHOCK Watch'
  - Name='Orient Star Automatic Silver Dial Mens Watch RE-AU0502S00B'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports Suits Style Automatic SRPD73 SRPD73K1 SRPD73K 100M Men's Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Surveyor Men's Watch 96A292'
  - Name='Orient Bambino Version 7 Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Mens Ancher Titanium & Stainless Steel Watch SKW6432'
  - Name='Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPJ85 Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz h69401960'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports Military 100M Camo Blue Dial Automatic Men's Watch SRP223K1'
  - Name='TISSOT SIDERAL S POWERMATIC 80 Men's WATCH'
  - Name='Orient Star Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Garmin vivomove Trend Smartwatch'
  - Name='Seiko Men's Astron SBXB053 / SSE053 GPS Solar Dual-Time'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports'
  - Name='Seiko 5 Sports Men's Automatic Watch SRPK31K1'
  - Name='BULOVA Men's Snorkel Watch'
  - Name='Orient Star Automatic Blue Mother of Pearl Dial Mens Watch RE-BY0004A00B'
  - Name='Men's Orient Star RE-AT0201G00B'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen AW1571 Steel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A steel watch with likely outdoor and durable qualities, similar to a field watch, though lacks explicit mention of titanium or 200m water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports Military Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military style automatic watch in sports line, shares outdoor/field use and durability focus, close to reference but automatic vs quartz and no titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Prospex Automatic Fieldmaster SBDY101 / SRPG15K
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fieldmaster model in Seiko Prospex line, automatic field watch designed for rugged use, likely close in function and durability though automatic movement differs from the quartz reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Prospex 1965 Heritage Diver's Watch SPB451J1
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diver's watch emphasizes water resistance and durability but diver design and specs may differ from field style Timex; more specialized for diving than general expedition.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Titanium Auto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Titanium field watch with reliable automatic movement, highly similar to reference in material, style, and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive One Solar Powered Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Solar powered dressy watch in steel, less focused on rugged field or expedition use, differing core purpose from Timex expedition watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic automatic watch with no specific mention of field or expedition features, likely more of casual/dress style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASIO G-SHOCK Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Known for extreme shock resistance and water resistance, shares durability and ruggedness though typically digital or hybrid rather than classic analog field style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Star Automatic Silver Dial Mens Watch RE-AU0502S00B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic watch with more dressy or classic styling, less emphasis on rugged field use or titanium/lightweight durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports Suits Style Automatic SRPD73 SRPD73K1 SRPD73K 100M Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Sports automatic watch with 100m water resistance and field/active styling, close in purpose but less water resistance and automatic versus quartz.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Surveyor Men's Watch 96A292
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field watch style but typically less emphasis on titanium or extreme water resistance, more dress-casual hybrid.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino Version 7 Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Primarily a dress watch with automatic movement, no emphasis on outdoor/rugged features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Mens Ancher Titanium & Stainless Steel Watch SKW6432
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Titanium case similar to reference, but Skagen tends toward minimalist/dress watches rather than rugged expedition style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's 5 Sports SRPJ85 Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casual sport automatic watch, shares some durability and versatility but less titanium and water resistance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Quartz h69401960
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz field watch from Hamilton with similar rugged field styling and likely durability, close in function to reference Timex.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports Military 100M Camo Blue Dial Automatic Men's Watch SRP223K1
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Military style with 100m water resistance and automatic movement, close to reference but lower water resistance and no titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: TISSOT SIDERAL S POWERMATIC 80 Men's WATCH
scores_with_rationales.rationale: More dress/sport hybrid automatic watch, lacks explicit rugged field/titanium or very high water resistance characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Star Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic automatic style watch with less emphasis on rugged field use, titanium, or high water resistance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Garmin vivomove Trend Smartwatch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smartwatch focused on fitness and hybrid display, very different in function and construction from mechanical/analog field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Men's Astron SBXB053 / SSE053 GPS Solar Dual-Time
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High tech solar GPS watch more for travel than rugged field use, different core usage and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General sports automatic watch line, shares casual durability and versatility but lacks specific titanium or high water resistance features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko 5 Sports Men's Automatic Watch SRPK31K1
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to above, casual sports automatic watch comparable in style and durability, but less water resistant and without titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BULOVA Men's Snorkel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diver-style watch with some rugged use capability, but different focus from field expedition watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Star Automatic Blue Mother of Pearl Dial Mens Watch RE-BY0004A00B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: More dressy automatic watch with decorative dial, unlikely to match rugged expedition functionality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Orient Star RE-AT0201G00B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic watch with dressy to casual style, less focused on outdoor ruggedness and titanium/lightweight construction.
